summary: A Montana bounty hunter and an anthropologist discover a tribe of Native Americans living in a settlement isolated from the rest of the world.
cast: Tom Berenger|Barbara Hershey|Kurtwood Smith|Steve Reevis|Andrew Miller|Gregory Scott Cummins|Mark Boone Junior|Helen Calahasen|Eugene Blackbear|Dawn Lavand|Sidel Standing Elk|Hunter Bodine|Graham Jarvis|Parley Baer|Sherwood Price|Zip|Molly Parker|Antony Holland|Robert Donley|Brian Stollery|Mitchell LaPlante|Jaime Watts|Wilford Brimley|Tasha Poemoceah|Gary Tsoodle
